Title: MoinMoin: Group ACL bypass
Synopsis:
MoinMoin contains a bug allowing a user to bypass group ACLs (Access
    Control Lists).

Background.Text: MoinMoin is a Python clone of WikiWiki, based on PikiPiki.

Description.Text: MoinMoin contains a bug in the code handling administrative group ACLs. A user created with the same name as an administrative group gains the privileges of the administrative group.

Impact.Text: If an administrative group called AdminGroup existed an attacker could create a user called AdminGroup and gain the privileges of the group AdminGroup. This could lead to unauthorized users gaining administrative access.

Workaround.Text: For every administrative group with special privileges create a user with the same name as the group.

P.Text:
All users should upgrade to the latest available version of MoinMoin,
    as follows:
